1.1.2.commit_description: Update against libgcrypt 1.9.1 for recent security release from GnuPG project.

1.1.1.commit_description: Un-deprecate the test profile with the latest release seeming to be working out well now across a range of systems.

1.0.4.commit_description: Deprecate this test profile since its old, rarely used, and not building nicely on modern systems.

1.0.3.commit_description: Updated download links plus build fix for Debian on ARM by Michael Schloh.

1.0.2.commit_description: Fix for gcrypt building on some systems due to gpg error libs. Patch provided by  Ed Swarthout.
